products.title: Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Simple, soft and warm, their bella blackout cream panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.

products.title: Bella Blackout Smoke Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This smoke blue panel blind freshens up any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Luna Blackout Bone Cream Perfect Fit
products.description: Luna blackoutbonecream perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
